CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function is vulnerable to command injection because it concatenates user-controlled input into a command that is executed by the system. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands by manipulating the 'repo' object, particularly 'repo.organization', 'repo.name', and 'repo.branch'. This could lead to arbitrary command execution on the server where this function is running.
